blogPost.title: RT @charlie_mccann: The generals wanted to wind the clock back a decade, says @thantmyintu. But by repressing the protests with such brutal…
blogPost.author: The Economist

sharedContent.title: The generals wanted to wind the clock back a decade, says @thantmyintu. But by repressing the protests with such brutality, they have turned the clock back further than intended, to the era when Myanmar was a pariah state. Great piece by our Asia columnist https://t.co/713KlqNZLE
sharedContent.author: Charlie McCann

localize.full_text: RT @charlie_mccann：@thantmyintu说，将军们想让时间倒流十年。但通过用如此残酷的方式镇压抗议活动... ...
localize.retweeted_status_full_text: @thantmyintu说，将军们想让时间倒流十年。但是，他们以如此残暴的方式镇压抗议活动，却让时光进一步倒流，回到了缅甸还是一个贱民国家的时代。我们亚洲专栏作家的精彩文章https://t.co/713KlqNZLE

localize.full_text: RT @charlie_mccann：@thantmyintu說，將軍們想讓時間倒流十年。但通過用如此殘酷的方式鎮壓抗議活動... ...
localize.retweeted_status_full_text: @thantmyintu說，將軍們想讓時間倒流十年。但是，他們以如此殘暴的方式鎮壓抗議活動，卻讓時光進一步倒流，回到了緬甸還是一個賤民國家的時代。我們亞洲專欄作家的精彩文章https://t.co/713KlqNZLE

previous.title: “Biggie: I Got A Story To Tell” shows a rap battle on the street in Brooklyn, with the pre-fame B.I.G. trouncing his rival. It is thrilling—and proof that his gifts were genuinely remarkable https://t.co/fq7gNclxke

localize.full_text: "Biggie: I Got A Story To Tell "展现了布鲁克林街头的一场说唱大战，成名前的B.I.G.击败了对手。这是惊心动魄的--也证明了他的天赋是真正了不起的https://t.co/fq7gNclxke。
"Biggie: I Got A Story To Tell "展現了布魯克林街頭的一場說唱大戰，成名前的B.I.G.擊敗了對手。這是驚心動魄的--也證明了他的天賦是真正了不起的https://t.co/fq7gNclxke。
